|cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand=Globespan |cpu2_model=GS7070;GS7070-174-008D A2; |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=AMD |fla1_model=AM29LV160DB |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model= |ram2=32 KiB |ram2_brand=ISSI |ram2_model=IS62LV256-70U |expansion_if_types=USB 1.1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial= |jtag= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=ADSL AFE;Globespan;GT3180;;1; |flags=ADSL |tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:E0:EB }} {{TagLine|ADSL Modem}} :''Broadxent Broadband Blaster'' - ''Creative Labs'' "3015-000523", "BROADXENT", "BritePort Discovery", "Rev.0.5" :and "© 2001" is silkscreened on the [http://i12.pixs.ru/storage/4/0/3/Briteport8_3682214_29423403.jpg main board]. *The FCC No. on the label is US: H8NDL01BR110D73CD ([http://remont-aud.net/forum/103-77911-1 Label]) :This would seem to indicate the device is a [[Askey]] RTA110-D73 :This device may thus be similar to the [[Askey RTA300W-D73]] *Used [[Globespan]] GS7070 and GT3180 chips for the ADSL modem. {{see also|Broadxent ADSL Gateway 8120|Actiontec R1524SU}} *[https://www.speedguide.net/routers/broadxent-8012u-v-dsl-modem-1284 ''Broadxent 8012U'' on '''SpeedGuide'''] *[https://www.ebay.com/itm/Broadxent-Briteport-8120-ADSL-Gateway-Zyxel-Prestige-643-Router-w-4-Port-Switch-/112771999968 ''Broadxent 8120'' on '''eBay'''] ([http://creativemodems.blogspot.ru/search/label/broadxent Creative]) *[https://www.insidegadgets.com/2014/08/26/inside-the-d-link-dsl-200-adsl-usb-modem-dated-2002/ ''D-Link DSL-200'' on '''InsideGadgets'''] 
USB ID: 2162 - Creative Labs.
        041e - Creative Technology, Ltd.
2162:2031 Network Blaster Wireless Adapter
2162:500c DE5771 Modem Blaster
